16 (Isaiah 53:11; Ephesians 1:18). Christ's Reward.--[Zechariah 9:16; Ephesians 1:18; Isaiah 53:11 quoted.] Christ looks upon His people in their purity and perfection as the reward of all His sufferings, His humiliation, and His love, and the supplement of His glory,--Christ the great center, from whom radiates all glory (RH Oct. 22, 1908).
